titles.title: Physician Shortage Minimization Act of 2016
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the treatment of locum tenens physicians as independent contractors to help alleviate physician shortages in underserved areas.
Physician Shortage Minimization Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Physician Shortage Minimization Act of 2016
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to classify, for employment tax purposes, certain physicians who provide medical services for a temporary period (locum tenens physicians) as independent contractors rather than as employees.
